body_html:
This is valid. I added synchronization to the script and got the following timings:

.argmax()              : 36.8158 ms
.cpu().argmax()        : 6.53611 ms 
.cpu().numpy().argmax(): 2.87929 ms

averaged across 20 runs, measuring only the ops showing up on left side of :.

script: https://gist.github.com/SsnL/6898c240d22faa91da16fc41359756a2

body:
This is valid. I added synchronization to the script and got the following timings:
```
.argmax()              : 36.8158 ms
.cpu().argmax()        : 6.53611 ms 
.cpu().numpy().argmax(): 2.87929 ms
```
averaged across 20 runs, measuring only the ops showing up on left side of `:`.

script: https://gist.github.com/SsnL/6898c240d22faa91da16fc41359756a2
